resources.string:
XuMoQi is an Android application to help learn words for games.
 
 Game types are:

Starting with blank(s): this displays words with a leading missing letter, represented as a blank.

Ending with blank(s): this displays words with a trailing missing letter.

Random blank(s): this displays words with a random letter missing.


 For each game type, the user enters either the entire word, or only the missing letters. Letters and words can be separated by commas and/or spaces.
 
 This version of XuMoQi uses the Scrabble Tournament Word List (TWL), the dictionary used in Canada, Thailand, and the United States.
 
 Copyright (©) by Jeff Pace, 2014.
 Released under the GNU General Public License, version 2.
 http://www.xumoqi.com
